about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of intrigue and mysteries in "The Adventures of Detective Bron"! In this captivating game, you will step into the shoes of the experienced detective Bron, and a colorful array of enigmatic events awaits your keen investigative skills.
Your primary mission will be to solve crimes of various kinds. You will encounter murders, maniacs, missing persons, robberies, and much more, and only you can shed light on these dark mysteries. In this world, there's no room for frivolity, as each puzzle is a challenge to your logical abilities.
You'll embark on a continuous quest for solutions, where every crucial clue becomes a vital key to success. Keep track of all essential details in your notebook to ensure you don't miss a single lead. In "The Adventures of Detective Bron," randomness has no place, and your attention to detail will be your greatest ally.
But be cautious, in this world, no one will hold your hand. This is your story, and your decisions will determine its outcome. Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of Detective Bron and prove that no crime will remain unsolved, no mystery left unanswered. Are you ready for the challenge?

content_descriptors.notes: The game features dead people with traces of violent death, there is blood. Verbally the possibilities of a sexual assault scene. Nudity is not represented.
